description:
Abramson, Brown & Dugan is New Hampshire's premier medical malpractice law firm, recognized for its client advocacy and track record of success. The firm's attorneys have won more medical malpractice settlements and verdicts than any other law firm in New Hampshire, recovering more than $275 million for its clients.

We handle all types of medical malpractice cases, including:

  • Birth injuries: Birth injuries due to the negligence or carelessness of a medical professional happen more often than most hospitals will admit. The most common serious birth injuries include cerebral palsy, Erb's palsy, neurological impairment and impairment of motor skills.
  • Brain injuries: Brain injuries may permanently affect one's cognitive ability, emotional stability and motor skills. If these injuries are caused by medical negligence, the medical provider is responsible.
  • Surgical errors: Surgical errors continue at an alarming rate. According to one report, 80 "never events" happen each week in our nation's operating rooms.
  • Failure to diagnose: Failure to diagnose cancer, heart attack, stroke or other diseases can have devastating effects for an entire family.

Our firm and attorneys are recognized in publications such as Best Law Firms, Best Lawyers in America, Super Lawyers, Benchmark Plaintiff and NH's Top Attorneys. Firm founder Mark Abramson has twice been named Lawyer of the Year for personal injury cases. While awards and accolades are a testament of our experience and knowledge, client satisfaction remains the most important measure of our success.

Contact Our Medical Malpractice Attorneys

We offer a free initial consultation to discuss your case. With offices in Manchester and Keene, Abramson, Brown & Dugan serves clients throughout New Hampshire. Call 603-463-0999 to schedule a consultation.
